gui

Interface GOGUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GoGUIIntegrator

    public interface GOGUI
    Created by daan.vanbeek on 13-12-16.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setBoardSize

        void setBoardSize(int size)
           throws InvalidCoordinateException
        Sets the board width and height to the given value. Adjusts the window size accordingly. Re-initialises the board, note that the existing stone configuration will be lost.
        Parameters:
        size - the desired width and height of the board.
        Throws:
        InvalidCoordinateException - when x or y coordinate fall outside of the board.

      • addStoneRC

        void addStoneRC(int row,
                int col,
                boolean white)
         throws InvalidCoordinateException
        Adds a new stone to the board of the given type and at the given position. Removes any existing stone/area indicator at the given position.
        Parameters:
        row - the x coordinate of the new stone, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        col - the y coordinate of the new stone, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        white - if true then a white stone will be added, otherwise a black stone will be added
        Throws:
        InvalidCoordinateException - when x or y coordinate fall outside of the board.

      • removeStone

        void removeStone(int x,
                 int y)
          throws InvalidCoordinateException
        Removes any existing stone at the given position. Does nothing if the position currently has no stone/area indicator.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the stone/area indicator to remove, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        y - the y coordinate of the stone/area indicator to remove, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        Throws:
        InvalidCoordinateException - when x or y coordinate fall outside of the board.

      • addAreaIndicator

        void addAreaIndicator(int x,
                      int y,
                      boolean white)
               throws InvalidCoordinateException
        Adds a new area indicator to the board of the given type and at the given position. Removes any existing stone/area indicator at the given position.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the new stone, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        y - the y coordinate of the new stone, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        white - if true then a white stone will be added, otherwise a black stone will be added
        Throws:
        InvalidCoordinateException - when x or y coordinate fall outside of the board.

      • addHintIndicator

        void addHintIndicator(int x,
                      int y)
               throws InvalidCoordinateException
        Adds a hint indicator to the board of the given type and at the given position.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the hint, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        y - the y coordinate of the hint, ranges from 0 to boardSize - 1.
        Throws:
        InvalidCoordinateException - when x or y coordinate fall outside of the board.

      • removeHintIdicator

        void removeHintIdicator()
        Hides the hint indicator.

      • clearBoard

        void clearBoard()
        Clears the board of all stones.

      • startGUI

        void startGUI()
        Starts the GO graphical user interface.

      • stopGUI

        void stopGUI()
        Stops the GO graphical user interface.

      • changeGuiTitle

        void changeGuiTitle(String title)

      • addStone

        void addStone(int x,
              int y,
              boolean white)

      • removeStoneRC

        void removeStoneRC(int row,
                   int col)
